title.narrative: DPSP III: Energy Efficiency in Public Buildings

description.narrative: The project development objectives are to reduce energy use in central government buildings and develop a transition plan to introduce sustainable financing and institutional mechanisms to support a scaled-up, national program for energy efficiency in public buildings

participating-org.narrative: International Bank for Reconstruction and Development

activity-date.narrative: Planned start date of the activity

mailing-address.narrative: The World Bank, 1818 H Street, NW, Washington, DC 20433 USA
